DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate long term outcome par plana vitrectomy ( PPV ) , without internal limiting membrane ( ILM ) peeling , eye persistent macular edema secondary branch retinal vein occlusion ( BRVO ) . Results suggest follow hypothesis : - PPV , without ILM peeling , appear beneficial eye persistent macular edema due BRVO - Effectiveness maintain long term - ILM peel significantly affect postoperative best correct visual acuity ( BCVA )
